definition: covered all over with cuts and bruises/beaten black and blue/be a mass of bruises
lit. one scale and half a claw (idiom); only odd bits and pieces
Lepidoptera (insect order including butterflies 蝶類|蝶类 and moths 蛾類|蛾类)
cuts and bruises like fish scales/terribly cut up
lit. a dragon's scale from the east and a dragon's claw from the west/odds and ends (idiom)
see 大鱗大麻哈魚|大鳞大麻哈鱼[da4 lin2 da2 ma2 ha3 yu2]
pinyin: da4 lin2 da2 ma3 ha3 yu2
da4 lin2 da2 ma2 ha3 yu2

definition: (bird species of China) pygmy wren-babbler (Pnoepyga pusilla)
(bird species of China) streak-throated woodpecker (Picus xanthopygaeus)
pinyin: lin2 hou2 lu:4 zhuo2 mu4 niao3

sentences.english: But anything that does not have fins and scales you may not eat; for you it is unclean.
sentences.chinese: 凡无翅无鳞的都不可吃，是与你们不洁净。

sentences.english: This is my advice. Give a glittering scale to each of the other fish.
sentences.chinese: 我建议你把你的闪光鳞，分给每条鱼一片。

sentences.english: Whales have scales. If has to be in there.
sentences.chinese: 鲸鱼有鳞，如果必须有的话。

sentences.english: Elongated mostly scaleless marine fishes with large pectoral fins and reduced pelvic fins.
sentences.chinese: 多数细长的无鳞海水鱼，有大的胸和退化的。

sentences.english: I was regaled with the scaly tips of the drumsticks of the fowls.
sentences.chinese: 给我吃的全是带着鳞皮的鸡爪子。

sentences.english: High-pressure water descaling spray nozzle is the crucial element of descaling equipment.
sentences.chinese: 高压水除鳞喷嘴是除鳞设备的关键零件。

sentences.english: High-pressure water descaling spray nozzle is the crucial element of descaling equipment.
sentences.chinese: 高压水除鳞喷嘴是除鳞设备的关键零件。

sentences.english: On the stone, there are scalelike stripes.
Methods: 61 patients with posterior hypopharyngeal wall carcinoma underwent operations.
sentences.chinese: 方法对61例下咽后壁鳞状细胞癌实施手术治疗。

sentences.english: He made me take off the rattles and tie them around his wrist, too.
sentences.chinese: 他叫我取下尾巴上的响鳞，他缠到了他的手腕子上。

sentences.english: Some bird's experts suggest that the feather-like structures may be bits and pieces of scales.
sentences.chinese: 有些鸟类专家说这些羽毛状的结构可能是鳞的碎片。

sentences.english: The snake is a reptile Squamata Serpentes.
sentences.chinese: 蛇是爬行纲有鳞目蛇亚目的总称。

sentences.english: Scrape off scales of live croaker, dig a net viscera and gills, wash.
sentences.chinese: 将活黄花鱼刮去鳞，掏净内脏及鳃，洗净。

sentences.english: Most species have paired fins and skin covered with either bony or tooth-like scales.
sentences.chinese: 多数的鱼都有一对鳍和覆盖在皮肤上的鳞。

sentences.english: This is absolutely the negate scale that touches her.
sentences.chinese: 这简直是触及她的逆鳞。

sentences.english: Whatsoever hath no fins nor scales in the waters, that shall be an abomination unto you.
sentences.chinese: 凡水里无翅无鳞的，你们都当以为可憎。

definition: a legendary dragon with the ability to control rain and floods/see also 蛟龍|蛟龙[jiao1 long2]
legendary dragon with the ability to control rain and floods
Blue Dragon, other name of the Azure Dragon 青龍|青龙 (the seven mansions of the east sky)
